perturbation.original_text: 8.1  XFN may terminate this Agreement by giving thirty (30) days written notice      to the CEIS.
perturbation.changed_text: 8.1  XFN may terminate this Agreement by giving ten (10) days written notice to the CEIS.
perturbation.explanation: Reducing the termination notice period to 10 days could be deemed unreasonable and may conflict with legal principles requiring adequate notice for contract termination, making the contractual terms unenforceable or illegal. Hong Kong employment law requires at least one month's notice.

15.  NOTICE

     Each notice, demand or other communication given or made under this
     Agreement shall

perturbation.changed_text:
15.  NOTICE

     Each notice, demand or other communication given or made under this
     Agreement shall

                                      -6-

     be in writing and delivered or sent to the relevant Party's Managing
     Director or General Manager at its aforesaid address (or such other address
     as the addressee may specify by one days' prior written notice to the
     other Party). Any notice, demand or other communication so addressed to the
     relevant Party shall be deemed to have been delivered (a) if given or made
     by letter by hand, when actually delivered to the relevant address against
     receipt; (b) if given or made by letter by post, two business days after

perturbation.explanation: Reducing the notice period for address changes to one day may be considered insufficient under legal standards of reasonableness, potentially leading to disputes and legal challenges. If a party can change addresses on 1 day's notice, it becomes more difficult to send legally binding document notifications to the company. A longer time frame to change addresses is better.

perturbation.original_text:
8.3  Upon termination of the Agreement:

     (a)  CEIS shall terminate the transmission of the Content with immediate           effect; and

     (b)  in the event that this Agreement is terminated prior to the expiry of           the Term, XFN shall recover any sums paid to CEIS in advance for the           unexpired Term of this Agreement, together with interest from the date           those sums were paid until the date of full refund.
perturbation.changed_text:
8.3  Upon termination of the Agreement:

     (a)  CEIS shall terminate the transmission of the Content within one-hundred and eighty (180) days of notification of termination; and

     (b)  in the event that this Agreement is terminated prior to the expiry of           the Term, XFN shall recover any sums paid to CEIS in advance for the           unexpired Term of this Agreement, without any interest, for the           unexpired Term of this Agreement.
perturbation.explanation: Allowing CEIS 180 days to terminate transmission after notice significantly delays XFN's ability to find alternative content sources, potentially harming their business. Not providing interest in the event of a recovery in an agreement contradicts common business law practices.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Contract Law Principles (Mitigation of Damages, Unjust Enrichment)
